nodes.text: The Rebellion era, sometimes referred to as the Classic era, takes place between 0 BBY (the Battle of Toprawa) and 4 ABY (the Battle of Endor), and into events after the battle until 5 ABY.
The events of the original trilogy (Episode IV A New Hope, Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, and Episode VI Return of the Jedi) take place during this era.
